task.title: How to Ensure Compensation
task.shortdesc: Many employers pay their interns. Every major has a different internship pay scale standard based on the field and experience level. In addition to wages, many employers add benefits to their internship compensation packets such as relocation assistance like a housing stipend.

context.p: Be sure that you are being properly compensated by your employer.

step.cmd: Confirm the hourly wage with the Human Resource representative who conducted your on boarding
Decide if you would like to be paid with a check or direct deposit

substep.cmd: If direct deposit is your preferred method for payment, provide your employer with your bank account information

info.note: Your employer will provide specific directions on how to enroll in direct deposit so that your paychecks will automatically be deposited into your bank account.

step.cmd: Familiarize yourself with the pay period of your employer
